Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz

19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.11.2003 SH SCR4769 Moved v.BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT from LOCATE FROM
- to LOCATE TO --> the SORT of BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT is descending
//22-09-2003 JP SCR #4371 remove "locate until" condition BADT
31.07.2003 SH SCR3879 Changed only CenterScreenInOnline to 'Y' if default = 'N'
20.05.2003 SH SCR3577 Set "CenterScreenInOnline = Y" to ini if screen started
- and locate cursor on the current row, only if the locate virtuals <> 0
20.05.2003 RR Init What'sToDo at the beginning of online-task
30.04.2003 SH SCR3244 Locate cursor of the current row if some of the
- subprograms were started and finished, therefore
CenterScreenInOnline has to set 'Y', if porgram finished reset to 'N'
27.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
05.02.2003 SCR2933 Add new button 'Ledger bookings' and call OAD520
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new field "BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" nedd as
- argument to call OPH106C to obtain table BADP
-- SCR#761 06.02.2002 SH (Redesigned OPH106B)
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- need to call OPH106C or OAD520
.. need to call OAD520
-- Call Daily received payments --> OPH106C
